snippet: The committee has spent close to $21 million on attack advertisements against President Obama since the second week of July, according to Federal Election Commission disclosures.
abstract: The committee has spent close to $21 million on attack advertisements against President Obama since the second week of July, according to Federal Election Commission disclosures.

headline.main: Republican National Committee Takes In $37.7 Million in July
headline.print_headline: Fund-Raising Report: Strong July for G.O.P.
